13.text: What the fuck is wrong with people?

20.text: I mean what other #!%@ing reason do you ask a girl to a dinner?

38.text: Society places a far higher value on the life of a woman than that of a man.

63.text: If women's tennis is known as the "sport where chicks freak out at the refs" then it's her fault.

94.text: Meanwhile fat white girls are the ones thinking obesity is "curvy".
